sen.j: 寄合（よりあい）とは、日本の中世以降、郷村制における村の協議機関のことをいう。
sen.e: Yoriai is a consultative organ in villages under the goson-sei system (municipal system of small towns and villages) began in the Middle Ages in Japan.
